Convert spatial geometries to a data.frame of coordinates

Source: R/bbox_st.R
bbox_st.Rd

Convert a spatial (sp/sf) object to a data.frame of ("xmin", "xmax", "ymin", "ymax")

bbox_st(AOI)

Arguments

AOI

any spatial object (raster, sf, sp). Can be piped (%>%) from getAOI

Value

a data.frame containing xmin. xmax, ymin, ymax coordinates

See also

bbox_sp

Examples
